name: Photons (rigidbodyinteractive)
description:
This light particle has lost confidence in itself due to the pressure of modern life. It was forced to flee from the evil Bosons and Lethal Traps that can reduce it to a motionless particle supported by friendly healing particles, the Curons.

It thus embarks on a difficult cathartic path to acquire the awareness of his true nature, progressively increasing its speed and thus remembering that it once traveled through space at the ... Speed of Light.

Survival Game for Mobile Devices. 

Absorb the energy

Expand your brightness

Destroy your enemies saturating them with light

Gain Experience

Level Up, become faster, stronger

Evolve Up to the Speed of Light.
